TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
On July 18, 2016 at 1:09 PM, ProtoJeb21 said:

How to Train Your Dagon: planetary scientists need to find out how to tame the eccentric orbit of Dagon (Fomalhaut b).

Would've thought it'd have more to do with fish-people, myself.
Super Mario Bro: Seriously, we all know nobody really cares about Luigi...
Hig Lander: a movie about an ovum and a few spermatazoids landing on a far away exoplanet with a b.o.son mechanics proppelled lander

The Fat and the Furious: a long, drawn out, and thoughtless series of action movies focusing on a group of obese criminals.

The Angry Bids Movie: a fight breaks out at a charity auction.

 

Edited September 22, 2016 by njmksr
Fiends: a series of movies about yours best friends ever
Titnic: a picnic made by birds.

Lost in Spa

A family gets lost in their spa pool...

 

ooops, that it two letters, sorry, my bad.

Edited September 24, 2016 by kiwi1960

The Potman Always Rings Twice

A transient tinker adopts an attention getting mannerism hoping to drum up business.
The Angry Bird Movie: Some guy gets attacked by a raven after exiting a McDonald's with a To-Go order.
The Exocist: a tumor grows outside a girl, then detaches itself and kills two priests.
At Man: A movie about a man whose at every place at one time. And at times, he literally stands next to himself...
To Gun: A movie about the journey of a young pilot trying to get to "Gun", a dark and mysterious place that nobody has managed to get to. (Original: Top Gun)

Moo (Moon) - Bessey was quietly chewing her cud until she got poked with a cow prod ... now Bessey's gonna chew on you

Canners (Scanners) - A few men with a bunch of cans, but no opener ... a survival story

Killing M Softly (Killing Me Softly) - James Bond goes postal on MI-6
Oon - A Saturn V accidentally knocks a quarter of the Moon off.
The Hunt for Ed October. The US military tries to find Ed October, who got lost running up the Grand Canyon.
The Cor:  A bunch of drunken Brits speaking Cockney

200: A Space Odyssey - Precursor to 300, but set IN SPACE!

2001: A Pace Odyssey - Exactly the same as 2001: A Space Odyssey, but even more sluggish.

201: A Space Odyssey - The sequel to 200.

001: A Space Odyssey - Agent 001 in SPACE!

The ROM - A guy finds a CD-ROM and promptly goes insane.

Finding Emo: people find emo's for some reason.

Fantastic Beat: WAT IS LUVE, BABBY DONT HORT MEH!
Finding Dor : The one and only movie about finding a door!

Rouge On - A Star Wars Story: Tired of their all white appearances, the storm troopers decide to form a more colourful storm troupe. It is your job as a make-up artist to have these brave souls ready for the big parade. (one letter removed. The fact that I shuffled the remaining around a bit is another matter entirely)
Aiwolf: Beep! Woof! I'm Robo-Wolf with artifical intelegence

The Ay after tomorrow : Arthur fonzarelli finds a time machine and travels into the future where he discovers the planet suffering from runaway global warming and only the cool of the fonz can save the world.

4 minutes ago, John FX said:

 

Wife and I met him this past summer. Great guy in real life!

Titani: A story about the Titanic's little sister who is forced into frontline service during WW2.

The Polar Xpress: The crew and management try to make the Polar Express hip and cool to compete with Polar Airways.

M. Bean: Mr. Bean is now French.

Edited December 17, 2016 by Spacetraindriver

Mona: Mona Lisa is gonna save Italy from disaster

(Moana)

Edited December 18, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66
